      • newClient

        public IngestClient newClient(URI uri)
        Create new client with concurrent ingestProcessor processor.

        The URI describes host and port of the node the client should connect to, with the parameter es.cluster.name for the cluster name.

        Specified by:
        newClient in interface ClientFactory
        Overrides:
        newClient in class AbstractIngestClient
        Parameters:
        uri - the cluster URI
        Returns:
        this indexer

      • initialSettings

        protected org.elasticsearch.common.settings.Settings initialSettings(URI uri,
                                                         int n)
        Initial settings tailored for index/ingestProcessor client use. Transport sniffing, only thread pool is for ingestProcessor/indexing, other thread pools are minimal, 4 * cpucore Netty connections in parallel.
        Specified by:
        initialSettings in class AbstractClient
        Parameters:
        uri - the cluster name URI
        n - the client thread pool size
        Returns:
        the initial settings
